tool_description: Performs detailed comparison between two database schemas, identifying structural differences, missing objects, and data model variations.

comparison_depth.description: Depth of comparison: surface, detailed, or comprehensive

ignore_naming_case.description: Whether to ignore case differences in object names

compare_data_samples.description: Whether to compare sample data for validation

error_messages: Schema not found: One or both schema identifiers are invalid.
Comparison failed: Unable to perform schema comparison due to access issues.
Invalid comparison depth: Use surface, detailed, or comprehensive.
Data sampling error: Unable to access sample data for comparison.
usage: Provide source_schema_id and target_schema_id for comparison. Set comparison_depth and boolean options to control comparison scope and behavior.

missing_objects_source.description: Objects present in target but missing in source

missing_objects_target.description: Objects present in source but missing in target

data_type_mismatches.description: Number of data type mismatches between schemas
